title: Bug 120315 - Display property set to 'none' does not take effect in the new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item is still visible.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item should not be visible.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Add a label to the PDF. 2. Open the 'Properties' view. 3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none' for the label. 4. Verify that the label is not visible in the generated PDF.
